response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards of quality and performance. Considering its unique features and benefits, I believe it's worth more than what most people are willing to pay. However, I am offering it to you today at an exclusive price of $150.
